articles.title: MLBPA sends out union authorization cards in first step toward unionizing minor leaguers
articles.description: The Major League Baseball Players Association took an initial step toward unionizing the minor leagues Sunday night, sending out authorization cards that will allow minor league players to trigger an election that could make them MLBPA members.

articles.title: Washington Commanders RB Brian Robinson in stable condition after being shot in attempted carjacking, source says
articles.description: Commanders rookie running back Brian Robinson is in stable condition after being shot multiple times during an attempted carjacking in Washington, D.C., a source with knowledge of the situation told ESPN.

articles.description: Rory McIlroy of Northern Ireland became the first three-time winner of the FedEx Cup with a sterling comeback in Sunday's final round of the Tour Championship.

articles.title: Hawai'i caps dominant run with fourth Little League World Series title
articles.description: Hawai'i outscored opponents by 55 runs over the course of the tournament and capped their dominant run with a 13-3 win over Curacao for the LLWS title.
